meanings.definition: A parasitic flatworm of the genus Schistosoma.
meanings.sent1: Schistosomes can cause health problems in humans.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the life cycle of schistosomes.
meanings.sent3: The schistosomes in the pond were throwing a party, but no one showed up.
meanings.sent4: The presence of schistosomes in the river symbolized the pollution levels.
meanings.sent5: Children were taught to avoid swimming in areas where schistosomes might be present.

meanings.sent1: Schistosomes can spread easily in areas with poor sanitation.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with schistosomes.
meanings.sent3: The schistosomes in the body were having a dance-off with the immune system.
meanings.sent4: The impact of schistosomes on health was like a silent invader.
meanings.sent5: The community worked together to eliminate schistosomes from the water supply.
